feature: Fix focus ring visibility on dark theme custom components
description: Update focus ring styles across custom components to use visible colors on dark backgrounds by changing focus:ring-offset-2 background color to match dark surface.

phases.name: Phase 1: Fix Button Component Focus Ring
phases.description: Update the Button component in tailadmin-ui to include dark mode ring offset color

subtasks.title: Add dark mode ring-offset color to Button component
subtasks.description: The Button component in web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.jsx uses focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 but has no dark mode offset color. Add dark:focus:ring-offset-dark-surface to match the page background (#0a0d0a).
subtasks.notes: Added dark:focus:ring-offset-dark-surface to Button component className to match dark theme page background (#0a0d0a)

phases.name: Phase 2: Fix Slider and Switch Invalid Color References
phases.description: Fix the Slider and Switch components that reference non-existent dark-surface-bg color

subtasks.title: Fix Slider component invalid color reference
subtasks.description: The Slider component uses dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface-bg but 'dark-surface-bg' is not defined in tailwind config. Change to dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface which correctly references the DEFAULT value (#0a0d0a).
subtasks.notes: Fixed invalid color reference in Slider Thumb component: changed dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface-bg to dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface. The suffix '-bg' was removed as the dark-surface color in tailwind config uses DEFAULT to define the page background color #0a0d0a.

subtasks.title: Fix Switch component invalid color reference
subtasks.description: The Switch component uses dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface-bg but 'dark-surface-bg' is not defined in tailwind config. Change to dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface.
subtasks.notes: Fixed invalid color reference in Switch component: changed dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface-bg to dark:focus-visible:ring-offset-dark-surface. The suffix '-bg' was removed as the dark-surface color in tailwind config uses DEFAULT to define the page background color #0a0d0a.

phases.name: Phase 3: Fix Dialog Close Button Focus Ring
phases.description: Update Dialog component close button to use proper dark mode focus ring offset

subtasks.title: Fix Dialog close button focus ring for dark mode
subtasks.description: The Dialog close button uses ring-offset-background with focus:ring-offset-2 but needs explicit dark mode handling. Add dark:focus:ring-offset-dark-surface for proper visibility on dark backgrounds.

phases.name: Phase 4: Verification and Testing
phases.description: Verify changes work correctly and test across components

subtasks.title: Run build to verify no compilation errors
subtasks.description: Run npm build to ensure all changes compile correctly and no invalid Tailwind classes remain.
